languages.text: "Если требуется предать себя и перекроить свою личность, то какой смысл в такой жизни?"

traits.locale_text: "Идира, мне жаль. Но если, чтобы жить требуется предать себя и перекроить свою личность, то какой смысл в такой жизни?"

languages.text: "If it means betraying yourself and changing the essence of who you are, then what sense is there in living such a life?"
languages.original_text: "Если требуется предать себя и перекроить свою личность, то какой смысл в такой жизни?"

traits.locale_text: "If it means betraying yourself and changing the essence of who you are, then what sense is there in living such a life?"
"If it means betraying yourself and changing the essence of who you are, then what sense is there in living such a life?"
"If it means betraying yourself and changing the essence of who you are, then what sense is there in living such a life?"
"If it means betraying yourself and changing the essence of who you are, then what sense is there in living such a life?"
"If it means betraying yourself and changing the essence of who you are, then what sense is there in living such a life?"

languages.text: “如果这意味着背叛你的本心，扭曲你的本质，那这样的人生还有什么意义？”
languages.original_text: "If it means betraying yourself and changing the essence of who you are, then what sense is there in living such a life?"

traits.locale_text: “如果这意味着背叛你的本心，扭曲你的本质，那这样的人生还有什么意义？”

languages.text: «Si implica traicionar a tu propia naturaleza y cambiar quien eres, ¿qué sentido tiene esa vida?».
languages.original_text: "If it means betraying yourself and changing the essence of who you are, then what sense is there in living such a life?"

traits.locale_text: «Si implica traicionar a tu propia naturaleza y cambiar quien eres, ¿qué sentido tiene esa vida?».

languages.text: "Wenn man sich selbst verraten und die Essenz seines Wesens verändern muss, welchen Sinn hat es dann, ein solches Leben zu führen?"
languages.original_text: "If it means betraying yourself and changing the essence of who you are, then what sense is there in living such a life?"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn man sich selbst verraten und die Essenz seines Wesens verändern muss, welchen Sinn hat es dann, ein solches Leben zu führen?"

languages.text: 「自分を裏切り、自分という人間の本質を変えることを意味するのであれば、そのような生き方に何の意味があるんだ？」
languages.original_text: "If it means betraying yourself and changing the essence of who you are, then what sense is there in living such a life?"

traits.locale_text: 「自分を裏切り、自分という人間の本質を変えることを意味するのであれば、そのような生き方に何の意味があるんだ？」

languages.text: « Si cela signifie se trahir soi-même et changer sa nature profonde, à quoi bon accepter de vivre une telle existence ? »
languages.original_text: "If it means betraying yourself and changing the essence of who you are, then what sense is there in living such a life?"

traits.locale_text: « Si cela signifie se trahir soi-même et changer sa nature profonde, à quoi bon accepter de vivre une telle existence ? »

languages.text: "Kendine ihanet etmek ve olduğun kişinin özünü değiştirmek anlamına geliyorsa öyle bir hayatı yaşamanın ne anlamı var?"
languages.original_text: "If it means betraying yourself and changing the essence of who you are, then what sense is there in living such a life?"

traits.locale_text: "Kendine ihanet etmek ve olduğun kişinin özünü değiştirmek anlamına geliyorsa öyle bir hayatı yaşamanın ne anlamı var?"
